overview: A magical kingdom, once peaceful and lush. Now it lies shrouded beneath a cloud of doom, trapped in perpetual night. Into this realm stride four unlikely heroes: a warrior, wizard, thief, and elf. Together they must face their greatest challenge ever . . . to conquer a deadly sorcerer and lift his Curse of Darkness. It's an epic adventure in a land where dragons rule the sky and danger lurks at every turn!
title: Dragon Strike™ Video
